com.googlecode.streamflyer.core.Modifier

  • Packages that use Modifier 
    Package Description
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.core
    This package contains the public API of project streamflyer.
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.range  
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.range2  
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.stateful  
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex
    This package contains the classes that are needed to apply regular expressions on character streams.
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.nomatch  
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.saxlike  
    com.googlecode.streamflyer.xml
    This package contains some classes to deal with infamous XML streams that contain characters that are allowed in XML 1.1 but not XML 1.0.
